data.name: Blaziken
data.flavorText: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.

data.name: Cresselia
data.flavorText: Shiny particles are released from its wings like a veil. It is said to represent the crescent moon.

data.name: Darkrai
data.flavorText: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.

data.name: Darkrai
data.flavorText: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.

data.name: Pachirisu
data.flavorText: It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.

data.name: Porygon-Z
data.flavorText: Additional software was installed to make it a better Pokémon. It began acting oddly, however.

data.name: Rotom
data.flavorText: Its body is composed of plasma. It is known to infiltrate electronic devices and wreak havoc.

data.name: Sceptile
data.flavorText: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice down thick trees. It is without peer in jungle combat.

data.name: Swampert
data.flavorText: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.

data.name: Tangrowth
data.flavorText: It ensnares prey by extending arms made of vines. Losing arms to predators does not trouble it.

data.name: Togekiss
data.flavorText: It will never appear where there is strife. Its sightings have become rare recently.

data.name: Altaria
data.flavorText: It looks like a fluffy cloud when it is in flight. It hums with its soprano voice.

data.name: Beedrill
data.flavorText: Its best attack involves flying around at high speed, striking with poison needles, then flying off.

data.name: Butterfree
data.flavorText: It loves the honey of flowers and can locate flower patches that have even tiny amounts of pollen.

data.name: Claydol
data.flavorText: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.

data.name: Dialga
data.flavorText: It has the power to control time. It appears in Sinnoh-region myths as an ancient deity.

data.name: Exploud
data.flavorText: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.

data.name: Houndoom
data.flavorText: Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be the call of the grim reaper.

data.name: Hypno
data.flavorText: Seeing its swinging pendulum can induce sleep in three seconds, even if someone just woke up.

data.name: Kingler
data.flavorText: The larger pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.

data.name: Lapras
data.flavorText: It loves crossing the sea with people and Pokémon on its back. It understands human speech.

data.name: Latias
data.flavorText: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.

data.name: Latios
data.flavorText: A highly intelligent Pokémon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.

data.name: Mawile
data.flavorText: Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed by horns. It can chew through iron beams.

data.name: Milotic
data.flavorText: When people bicker, it is said to arise from the depths of lakes to becalm violent hearts.

data.name: Palkia
data.flavorText: It has the ability to distort space. It is described as a deity in Sinnoh-region mythology.

data.name: Primeape
data.flavorText: It grows angry if you see its eyes and gets angrier if you run. If you beat it, it gets even madder.

data.name: Slowking
data.flavorText: Being bitten by Shellder gave it intelligence comparable to that of award-winning scientists.

data.name: Unown H
data.flavorText: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or UNOWN came first.

data.name: Wailord
data.flavorText: The biggest of all Pokémon. It can dive to a depth of almost 10,000 feet on only one breath.

data.name: Weezing
data.flavorText: It grows by feeding on gases released by garbage. Though very rare, triplets have been found.

data.name: Wigglytuff
data.flavorText: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.

data.name: Arbok
data.flavorText: The pattern on its belly is for intimidation. It constricts foes while they are frozen in fear.

data.name: Cacturne
data.flavorText: It becomes active at night, seeking prey that is exhausted from the day's desert heat.

data.name: Combusken
data.flavorText: Its kicking mastery lets it loose 10 kicks per second. It emits sharp cries to intimidate foes.

data.name: Delibird
data.flavorText: It carries food rolled up in its tail. It has the habit of sharing food with people lost in mountains.

data.name: Floatzel
data.flavorText: It floats using its well-developed floatation sac. It assists in the rescues of drowning people.

data.name: Gorebyss
data.flavorText: It lives at the bottom of the sea. In the springtime, its pink body turns more vivid for some reason.

data.name: Granbull
data.flavorText: It is timid in spite of its looks. If it becomes enraged, however, it will strike with its huge fangs.

data.name: Grovyle
data.flavorText: It lives in dense jungles. While closing in on its prey, it leaps from branch to branch.

data.name: Hariyama
data.flavorText: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a truck flying with its arm thrusts.

data.name: Huntail
data.flavorText: It lives deep in the sea. With a tail shaped like a small fish, it attracts unsuspecting prey.

data.name: Linoone
data.flavorText: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.

data.name: Loudred
data.flavorText: The shock waves from its cries can tip over trucks. It stamps its feet to power up.

data.name: Magcargo
data.flavorText: Its body temperature is roughly 18,000 degrees F. Flames spout from gaps in its hardened shell.

data.name: Marshtomp
data.flavorText: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.

data.name: Metapod
data.flavorText: A steel-hard shell protects its tender body. It quietly endures hardships while awaiting evolution.

data.name: Pelipper
data.flavorText: It dips its large bill in the sea, then scoops up numerous prey along with water.

data.name: Porygon2
data.flavorText: With planetary development software installed, it became capable of working in space.

data.name: Purugly
data.flavorText: It is a brazen brute that barges its way into another Pokémon's nest and claims it as its own.

data.name: Relicanth
data.flavorText: A rare Pokémon discovered during a deep-sea exploration. It has not changed in over 100 million years.

data.name: Seviper
data.flavorText: For many generations, it has feuded with ZANGOOSE. It whets its bladed tail on rocks for battle.

data.name: Skarmory
data.flavorText: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.

data.name: Slowbro
data.flavorText: Though usually dim witted, it seems to become inspired if the SHELLDER on its tail bites down.

data.name: Togetic
data.flavorText: It is said to appear in front of kindly people to scatter a glowing down called "joy dust."

data.name: Unown F
data.flavorText: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or UNOWN came first.

data.name: Unown G
data.flavorText: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or UNOWN came first.

data.name: Wailmer
data.flavorText: On sunny days, it lands on beaches to bounce like a ball and play. It spouts water from its nose.

data.name: Zangoose
data.flavorText: It has feuded with SEVIPER for many generations. Its sharp claws are its biggest weapons.

data.name: Baltoy
data.flavorText: It moves by spinning on its foot. It is a rare Pokémon that was discovered in ancient ruins.

data.name: Buizel
data.flavorText: It has a flotation sac that is like an inflatable collar. It floats on water with its head out.

data.name: Cacnea
data.flavorText: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive 30 days without water.

data.name: Caterpie
data.flavorText: It releases a stench from its red antenna to repel enemies. It grows by molting repeatedly.

data.name: Clamperl
data.flavorText: It makes a single pearl during its lifetime. The pearl is said to amplify psychic power.

data.name: Drowzee
data.flavorText: It can tell what people are dreaming by sniffing with its big nose. It loves fun dreams.

data.name: Ekans
data.flavorText: It sneaks through grass without making a sound and strikes unsuspecting prey from behind.

data.name: Feebas
data.flavorText: It is famous for its shabby appearance. While populous, they tend to cluster in set locations.

data.name: Glameow
data.flavorText: It claws if displeased and purrs when affectionate. Its fickleness is very popular among some.

data.name: Houndour
data.flavorText: It conveys its feelings using different cries. It works in a pack to cleverly take down prey.

data.name: Igglybuff
data.flavorText: It has a soft and bouncy body. Once it starts bouncing, it becomes impossible to stop.

data.name: Illumise
data.flavorText: With its sweet aroma, it guides VOLBEAT to draw signs with light in the night sky.

data.name: Jigglypuff
data.flavorText: When it wavers its big, round eyes, it begins singing a lullaby that makes everyone drowsy.

data.name: Kakuna
data.flavorText: While awaiting evolution, it hides from predators under leaves and in nooks of branches.

data.name: Koffing
data.flavorText: Lighter-than-air gases in its body keep it aloft. The gases not only smell, they are also explosive.

data.name: Krabby
data.flavorText: It lives in burrows dug on sandy beaches. Its pincers fully grow back if they are broken in battle.

data.name: Lunatone
data.flavorText: Because it turns active on nights of the full moon, it is said to have some link to the lunar phases.

data.name: Luvdisc
data.flavorText: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.

data.name: Makuhita
data.flavorText: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.

data.name: Mankey
data.flavorText: It lives in treetop colonies. If one becomes enraged, the whole colony rampages for no reason.

data.name: Mudkip
data.flavorText: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.

data.name: Porygon
data.flavorText: The world's first artificially created Pokémon. It can travel through electronic space.

data.name: Slowpoke
data.flavorText: Although slow, it is skilled at fishing with its tail. It does not feel pain if its tail is bitten.

data.name: Slugma
data.flavorText: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn't keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

data.name: Snubbull
data.flavorText: Small Pokémon flee from its scary face. It is, however, considered by women to be cute.

data.name: Solrock
data.flavorText: A new Pokémon species, rumored to be from the sun. It gives off light while spinning.

data.name: Swablu
data.flavorText: Its wings are like cotton tufts. If it perches on someone's head, it looks like a cotton hat.

data.name: Tangela
data.flavorText: It is shrouded by blue vines. No one has seen the face hidden behind this growth of vines.

data.name: Togepi
data.flavorText: Its shell is said to be stuffed with happiness that it shares with kindhearted people.

data.name: Torchic
data.flavorText: A fire burns inside, so it feels very warm to hug. It launches fireballs of 1,800 degrees F.

data.name: Treecko
data.flavorText: The soles of its feet are covered by countless tiny spikes, enabling it to walk on walls and ceilings.

data.name: Unown L
data.flavorText: Shaped like ancient writing, it is a huge mystery whether language or UNOWN came first.

data.name: Volbeat
data.flavorText: It communicates with others by lighting up its rear at night. It loves ILLUMISE's sweet aroma.

data.name: Weedle
data.flavorText: It eats its weight in leaves every day. It fends off attackers with the needle on its head.

data.name: Whismur
data.flavorText: Usually, its cries are like quiet murmurs.  If frightened, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.

data.name: Wingull
data.flavorText: It makes its nest on steep sea cliffs. Riding updrafts, it soars to great heights.

data.name: Zigzagoon
data.flavorText: It walks in zigzag fashion. It is good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.
